155.title: Nefarious Nephews

1553.content:
A few days ago, my sister-in-law, Marian called and asked if I'd babysit my teenage nephew for a few days; I agreed without a second thought. When he stepped out of the cab, I almost fainted from shock. You see, my family has always been a little petite, and I know my partner, Jim's family is the same, so to see this behemoth block out the sun as he approached me, weakened my knees.

"Hi, Aunty Gemma."

I stared up at him in awe as he dropped his heavy duffel bag by my feet, slunk his hands under my arms, and lifted me in front of him. My body swayed like a ragdoll in his grasp. He kissed me on the forehead, as one would a small child, before placing me back down and walking inside, leaving me to drag his heavy bag in the house.

After staring slack-jawed at him for so long, it shouldn't have surprised me that his head scraped against the ceiling as he walked, but it did. As did the calm demeanor he showed as he tossed himself down on the couch and flicked on the television.

"When will Uncle Jim get home?"
1553.title: Butch Calhoun

choices: I attempted to push his hand away from me.
He gripped my throat and forced me down.
15532.content:
As I answered him from the foot of the couch, the television blasted to life, and he shot back to his feet. The black-and-white static showered over him like the radiant aura of a forgotten god.

"Good. That'll give us a little time to - catch up."

His menacing smile shot deep waves of unsettlement. I felt like backing away from him but found my soles planted firmly to the carpet as he slowly lurched over to me.

"You're awful quiet, Aunty Gemma. Is everything alright?"

I felt my lips open, but no sound escaped my maw. I stood and stared in awe as he lumbered over and gripped my arms, pinning them to my sides.

"Ooh, you're so cold. Here, come sit with me a while. I'll keep you warm."

I know I should have stopped him, but I physically couldn't. Everything about him intimidated me. Especially when he effortlessly lifted and carried me over to the couch where he plopped me down next to him as though I were a mischievous toddler. Still paralyzed, I stared forward at the rolling hills of heavy static wafting over the television screen.

One monstrous paw rested lazily upon my exposed thigh while the other continuously flipped a lock of my hair, rubbing it uncomfortably against my cheek. I squirmed, but his grip tightened, and I steadied myself before he broke my femur.

"Why are you so tense, Aunty Gemma? Don't you like me? Am I doing something wrong?"

That should have sent me into a frenzy, but it didn't, and the moment passed. My silent suffering continued as I shook my head. Why I did that, I still don't know. I knew what thoughts my confusing reply had brung when he smiled back at me. That evil in his face spread further as his grip loosened and began moving north.

His sausage-like fingers slipped under my skirt when...
15532.title: "In a few hours."
